abstract: Americans of Somali descent Amina Farah Ali and Hawo Mohamed Hassan are convicted of conspiring to funnel money to the Shabab, the terrorist group in Somalia.
snippet: Two women were convicted Thursday of conspiring to funnel money to Shabab, a group in Somalia which the United States considers a terrorist organization with ties to Al Qaeda.
lead_paragraph: Two women were convicted Thursday of conspiring to funnel money to Shabab, a group in Somalia which the United States considers a terrorist organization with ties to Al Qaeda.

headline.main: Minnesota: 2 Women Guilty of Aiding Terrorist Group
headline.print_headline: Minnesota: 2 Women Guilty of Aiding Terrorist Group
headline.seo: In Minnesota, Two Women Guilty of Aiding Terrorist Group
